title: Design your fonts from Ipad
content:
I have created a tool for you to create fonts directly from iPad. It has been over two years in the making. Please let me know how I can improve it. Enjoy! MDH

Apple App store--//urFonts

[www.untilnowcreations.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718202852/http:/www.untilnowcreations.com/ "www.untilnowcreations.com")
author: mdh777

comments.content:
Cool. When you make an Android version I'll check it out.

hhp
